definition: Giant Wild Goose Pagoda in Xi'an
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
wild goose
pagoda/tower/minaret/stupa (abbr. loanword from Sanskrit tapo)/CL:座[zuo4]

sentences.english: Now you understand the story about Master Monk Xuanzang and why the Dayan Pagoda was built?
sentences.chinese: 這下你瞭解了玄奘大師的故事和大雁塔的來歷了吧？

sentences.english: Xuanzang built the pagoda in order to have a place for his Buddhist books.
sentences.chinese: 玄奘修建大雁塔是爲了存放經書。

sentences.english: People always connect Xi'an with the Big Goose Pagoda and Terracotta Warriors and Horses.
sentences.chinese: 人們一提到西安就會聯想到大雁塔和兵馬俑。

sentences.english: I didn't know he designed the pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 原來大雁塔是他設計的。

sentences.english: It is the landmark of the ancient capital city - Xian.
sentences.chinese: 大雁塔是古都西安的標誌建築。

sentences.english: The Wild Goose Pagoda was dimly visible.
Visit Big Wild Goose Pagoda and Shaanxi History Museum in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 早上參觀大雁塔和陝西曆史博物館。

sentences.english: The Dayan Pagoda is also called Daci'en Pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 這大雁塔呢又叫大慈恩寺塔。

sentences.english: The Dayan Pagoda is the symbol of Xi'an.
sentences.chinese: 大雁塔已成爲西安的象徵。

sentences.english: That's why the Dayan Pagoda was built.
sentences.chinese: 這就和大雁塔有關了呀。

sentences.english: Xi'an Ancient City Wall, Big Goose Pagoda, Forest of Stelae Museum Half- Day Private Tour.
sentences.chinese: 西安古城牆，大雁塔，碑林博物館半日遊。

sentences.english: It is located in the southern suburb of Xian City, about 4 kilometers (2.49 miles) from the downtown of the city.
sentences.chinese: 大雁塔位於西安南郊大慈恩寺內，距市中心約4公里。

sentences.english: Visit the Big Wild Goose Pogoda, finish the trip, drive tourists back to their hotels.
sentences.chinese: 參觀大雁塔，結束後，送各位遊客返回酒店。

sentences.english: It seems necessary for me to tell you the story about Xuanzang and the Dayan Pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 看來啊，我得給你好好講講這玄奘和大雁塔的故事了。

sentences.english: Oh, that's how the pagoda came into existence.
sentences.chinese: 原來大雁塔是這麼來的。

sentences.english: In the morning , Visit Big Wild Goose Pagoda and Shaanxi History Museum in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 早上，參觀大雁塔和陝西曆史博物館。

definition: Small Wild Goose Pagoda in Xi'an
Yanta District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
Tang Paradise in Xi'an
Daci'en Buddhist temple in Xi'an
Forest of Steles (museum in Xi'an)/Beilin District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
figurines of warriors and horses buried with the dead/Terracotta Army (historic site)
Zhonglou district of Changzhou city 常州市[Chang2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
bell tower/campanile/clock tower/Bell Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
Longmen Grottoes at Luoyang 洛陽|洛阳[Luo4 yang2], Henan
memorial hall to Zhuge Liang 諸葛亮|诸葛亮 (many of them in different town)/refers to tourist attraction in Chengdu 成都
Mogao caves in Dunhuang 敦煌, Gansu
Xi'an, sub-provincial city and capital of Shaanxi 陝西省|陕西省[Shan3 xi1 Sheng3] in northwest China/see 西安區|西安区[Xi1 an1 qu1]
the Baima or White Horse Temple in Luoyang, one of the earliest Buddhist temples in China
a drum tower/Drum Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
TV tower
the Yingxian wooden pagoda or Sakyamuni Pagoda near Datong in Shanxi province
Du Fu's Thatched Cottage (park and museum in Chengdu)
